title.rendered: 18 Student-Athletes Sign National Letters of Intent

content.rendered:
On November 8, 18 student-athletes signed National Letters of Intent to compete at the collegiate level.  A National Letter of Intent is a commitment to play sports at an NCAA college or university.

Below is a list of the student-athletes, where they are going, and what sport(s) they will play there:

  • Anya Belisle: Cross Country/Track at University of New Mexico
  • Mia Bolster: Field Hockey at Wagner College
  • Emily Bush: Cross Country/Track at Providence College
  • Paul Cuneo: Crew Syracuse at University
  • Angelina Damiano: Diving at Indiana State University
  • Kellen Dean: Golf at Xavier
  • Genevieve Duchaussee: Cross Country/Track at Northeastern
  • Rodell Evans: Football at Cornell
  • Catherine Fox: Rowing at University of Washington
  • Carter Hills: Lacrosse at Quinnipiac
  • Michael Mack: Baseball at Northeastern
  • Amelia McBain: Track at Penn State University
  • Christian Mello: Baseball at University of Albany
  • Madelyn Nolan: Rowing at Rutgers University
  • Camden Rhude: Baseball at Indiana University of Pennsylvania
  • Ryann Soltis: Softball at Goldey-Beacom College
  • Ava Voorhies: Rowing at University of Massachusetts-Amherst
  • Carly Wise: Lacrosse at Clemson University
